note: Yvonne is the Co-Founder and Executive Director of Solidarity Research Center, a worker self-directed nonprofit that builds solidarity economy ecosystems through data science, story-based strategy, and action research. She is based in Los Angeles, California, where the sun smiles on her every day. Although a native of NYC, she and the city have broken up and went their separate ways. She is a practitioner of research justice with over 20 years of being a nerd for social movements.
